Package datalayer.model

Class BikeFactory

java.lang.Object
datalayer.model.BikeFactory
public class BikeFactory
extends java.lang.Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Bike> getAllBike()
    Use this function instead of BikeFactory.getAll() Select the table "bike" in database Get all Bikes, and save them to "bikes"
    Bike getBikeById​(int bikeId)
    Use this function instead of BikeFactory.get() Select the table "bike" in database Get Bike by id, and save it to "bikes"
    java.util.List<Bike> getBikeByStationId​(int stationId)
    Select the table "bike" in database Get Bikes which has bike.stationId = stationId
    static BikeFactory getInstance()
    We use Singleton to create only one object of BikeFactory, cause BikeFactory has "bikes" map the id of Category object to Bike object

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
